Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl

Class BudgetDetailServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.BudgetDetailServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetDetailService
@Service public class BudgetDetailServiceImpl extends Object implements BudgetDetailService
Service implementation for handling budget details. It includes methods to save, retrieve, and update budget details while also maintaining the associated budget.

    • saveBudgetDetail

      public BudgetDetailResponseDTO saveBudgetDetail(BudgetDetailRequestDTO budgetDetail)
      Saves a new BudgetDetail entity. It validates whether the budget has enough funds in the case of spending.

    • updateBudgetDetail

      public BudgetDetailResponseDTO updateBudgetDetail(Long budgetDetailId, BudgetDetailRequestDTO updatedDetail)
      Updates an existing BudgetDetail entity. Adjusts the parent budget based on the difference between the original and new amount.
      Specified by:
      updateBudgetDetail in interface BudgetDetailService
      Parameters:
      budgetDetailId - the ID of the budget detail to update
      updatedDetail - the updated budget detail data
      Returns:
      the updated budget detail
